entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
